scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'backend,worker,frontend' -c 'blue.bold,yellow.bold,green.bold' "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run start:worker:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:no-worker: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c 'blue.bold,green.bold' "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.redis:stop: docker stop spotlib-redis && docker rm spotlib-redis
scripts.cq: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run prettier:check && npm run test
scripts.cq:local: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run prettier:fix
scripts.restoredb: psql "postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/postgres" -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS spotlib;" && psql "postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/postgres" -c "CREATE DATABASE spotlib;" && pg_restore -d "postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/spotlib" --no-owner --no-privileges database_dump.dump
scripts.clonedb: npm run dumpdb && npm run restoredb
